name: Hop! A frog jumping game
description:
A simple platformer, time your jumps just right to get across the pond!

Controls: 

  • Space : Jump
  • R : Reset
  • Esc : Pause

*Controls can be reconfigured in game*

**Mouse required to use menus**

Hold the jump button to build up your jump strength, then release to make a leap towards the goal!

There are 24 levels for you to jump your way across!

Extracted File Size: 288 MB
